reference.title: References
reference.shortdesc: I've included some handy reference tables, both specific to this kitchen and for general use.

row.entry: Dry ingredients such as rolled oats, flour, sugar, and baking soda can all be found in the top cupboard across from the sink, nearest to the basement door.

Fresh ingredients such as meats, vegetables, as well as refrigerated items such as milk, butter, and tofu, can all be found in the refrigerator. If an ingredient has either a "C", "A", or no marking on it, it's free to use. If there is a "J" or a "T" marking on it, you can't use it.
All seasonings such as cumin and cinnamon can be found on the shelf above the oven.

ul.li: The coffee machine is next to the microwave.
The toaster is on the counter that lines the far wall behind the stove.
All pots and pants are in the cabinets below and to the left of the sink.
More frequently used cooking utensils are in the vase next to the stove, but there are more in the drawer to the left of the stove.
